meanings.definition: A specific time or date by which something must be completed or submitted.
meanings.sent1: The deadlined for the project is tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: I always struggle to meet the deadlined for my assignments.
meanings.sent3: The team celebrated reaching the deadlined for the report with a pizza party.
meanings.sent4: The deadlined loomed over me like a dark cloud, reminding me of the impending due date.
meanings.sent5: Missing the deadlined for the application could result in disqualification.

meanings.definition: To set a deadline for a task or project.
meanings.sent1: I deadlined the presentation for next Friday.
meanings.sent2: Remember to deadlined the budget proposal by the end of the week.
meanings.sent3: The manager deadlined the team's progress to ensure timely completion.
meanings.sent4: She deadlined the project with precision, allowing no room for delays.
meanings.sent5: The professor deadlined the research paper to encourage early submissions.

meanings.definition: The act of completing a task by a specified deadline.
meanings.sent1: Meeting the deadlined for the project was a relief.
meanings.sent2: Her efficiency in meeting the deadlined impressed the entire team.
meanings.sent3: The cat completing the obstacle course before the deadlined was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: He raced against time to finish the task before the deadlined expired.
meanings.sent5: The deadlined motivated her to work diligently and finish ahead of schedule.
